trans-unit.source: Defines an interface that enables the extension of specific behaviors of an HTML control designer.
trans-unit.target: Define uma interface que permite que a extensão dos comportamentos específicos de um designer de controle HTML.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior> interface is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior> interface está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView> interfaces for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView> interfaces para a funcionalidade de designer de controle equivalente.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the designer that the behavior is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o designer ao qual o comportamento está associado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner" /> that the behavior is associated with.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.HtmlControlDesigner" /> o comportamento associado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior" /> interface is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior" /> interface está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: Use the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag" /> and <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView" /> interfaces for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: Use o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag" /> e <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView" /> interfaces para a funcionalidade de designer de controle equivalente.

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that the designer is associated with.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o elemento ao qual o designer está associado.

trans-unit.source: The object that the designer is associated with.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que o designer está associado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior" /> interface is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior" /> interface está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: Use the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag" /> and <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView" /> interfaces for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: Use o <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag" /> e <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView" /> interfaces para a funcionalidade de designer de controle equivalente.

trans-unit.source: The attribute to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O atributo a ser recuperado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the attribute syntax is case-insensitive; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a sintaxe do atributo não diferenciar maiúsculas de minúsculas; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified attribute.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o atributo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The attribute that was retrieved.
trans-unit.target: O atributo que foi recuperado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior.GetAttribute%2A> method is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior.GetAttribute%2A> método está obsoleto.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.GetAttribute%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.GetAttribute%2A> método no <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> classe para a funcionalidade de designer de controle equivalente.

trans-unit.source: The style attribute to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O atributo de estilo a ser recuperado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the attribute is only active at design time; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o atributo estiver ativo somente em tempo de design; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the attribute syntax is case-insensitive; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a sintaxe do atributo não diferenciar maiúsculas de minúsculas; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified style attribute.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o atributo de estilo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The style attribute that was retrieved.
trans-unit.target: O atributo de estilo que foi recuperado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior.GetStyleAttribute%2A> method is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior.GetStyleAttribute%2A> método está obsoleto.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A> método o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> classe para a funcionalidade de designer de controle equivalente.

trans-unit.source: The attribute to remove.
trans-unit.target: O atributo a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the attribute syntax is case-insensitive; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a sintaxe do atributo não diferenciar maiúsculas de minúsculas; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified attribute.
trans-unit.target: Remove o atributo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior.RemoveAttribute%2A> method is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior.RemoveAttribute%2A> método está obsoleto.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.RemoveAttribute%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.RemoveAttribute%2A> método no <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> classe para a funcionalidade de designer de controle equivalente.

trans-unit.source: The style attribute to remove.
trans-unit.target: O atributo de estilo a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the attribute is only active at design time; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o atributo estiver ativo somente em tempo de design; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the attribute syntax is case-insensitive; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a sintaxe do atributo não diferenciar maiúsculas de minúsculas; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified style attribute.
trans-unit.target: Remove o atributo de estilo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The attribute to set.
trans-unit.target: O atributo a ser definido.

trans-unit.source: The object on which to set the attribute.
trans-unit.target: O objeto no qual definir o atributo.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the attribute syntax is case-insensitive; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a sintaxe do atributo não diferenciar maiúsculas de minúsculas; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified attribute to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Define o atributo especificado para o objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior.SetAttribute%2A> method is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior.SetAttribute%2A> método está obsoleto.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.SetAttribute%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerTag.SetAttribute%2A> método no <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.Tag%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> classe para a funcionalidade de designer de controle equivalente.

trans-unit.source: The attribute to set.
trans-unit.target: O atributo a ser definido.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the attribute is only active at design-time; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o atributo estiver ativo somente em tempo de design; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The object to set the attribute on.
trans-unit.target: O objeto no qual definir o atributo.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the attribute syntax is case-insensitive; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a sintaxe do atributo não diferenciar maiúsculas de minúsculas; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Sets the specified style attribute to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: Define o atributo de estilo especificado para o objeto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior.SetStyleAttribute%2A> method is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IHtmlControlDesignerBehavior.SetStyleAttribute%2A> método está obsoleto.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.AddDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> class for equivalent control designer functionality.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner.AddDesignTimeCssAttributes%2A> método o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ContainerControlDesigner> classe para a funcionalidade de designer de controle equivalente.
